title: Confront the Elder Brain
content: l reduce the HP of the Elder Brain by 10% in the final confrontation. After your failed attempt, your team will be teleported to Astral Plane. There you need to decide whether to let Emperor suck Prince Orpheus' brain, or free Orpheus (with the Hammer you get in quest Free Orpheus) and let him or one of your teammates turn into Mind Flayer.
